thread.title: De'Aaron Fox, Bam Adebayo Involved in Car Accident
thread.title_full: De'Aaron Fox, Bam Adebayo Involved in Car Accident

author: Joseph Zucker
title: De'Aaron Fox, Bam Adebayo Involved in Car Accident
text: De'Aaron Fox, Bam Adebayo Involved in Car Accident Joe Robbins/Getty Images Joseph Zucker Featured Columnist February 12, 2017 Two Kentucky Wildcats freshmen basketball players, De'Aaron Fox and Bam Adebayo, were involved in a car accident Sunday afternoon, LEX18 reported. A Kentucky spokesperson confirmed neither Fox nor Adebayo, who were both passengers, was hurt in the crash. The two players were receiving a ride to the Kentucky campus. Shortly after the accident, they left the scene in another vehicle and arrived at the Joe Craft Center, where they talked with police. Fox and Adebayo have been key players for the Wildcats in 2016-17. Fox is the team's second-leading scorer (15.7 points per game) and sits second in assists (5.4 per game). Adebayo is averaging 12.9 points per game and is first in rebounds (6.9) and blocks (1.6). Kentucky beat the Alabama Crimson Tide 67-58 on Saturday night and returns to the court Tuesday night to face off with the Tennessee Volunteers. Like the new article format? !
